answerText: Arrow of God [10] Arrow of God is a work of this prominent Nigerian author, who attacked Conrad in "An Image of Africa" and wrote that book Things Fall Apart.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Chicago A  | 22 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this novel, Oduche, the son of the protagonist, converts to Christianity and tries to kill the sacred python of Ezidemili. For 10 points each: [10] What novel sees the Feast of the New Yam turned into a Christian Festival, instead of a sacrifice in the name of Ulu?
